title: Blizzard, winter storm warnings issued, could be biggest in decade | Live updates

title: Webb Reveals Hidden Layers of Uranus’ Upper Atmosphere
desc: For the first time, astronomers have mapped the vertical structure of Uranus’ ionosphere, uncovering unexpected temperature peaks, weakened ion densities, and puzzling dark regions shaped by the planet’s extreme magnetic field.
